org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang

Class DynamicLikeOptimizationTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseTestCase
          • org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.BaseJDBCTestCase
            • org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.DynamicLikeOptimizationTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class DynamicLikeOptimizationTest
extends BaseJDBCTestCase
    Test the dynamic like optimization.

    NOTE: the metadata test does a bunch of likes with parameters.

      • testGeneratedPredicates

        private void testGeneratedPredicates(java.sql.PreparedStatement ps,
                                     java.lang.String[][][] rows)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Helper method for testGeneratedPredicates*. Executes a prepared statement with different parameter values and compares result to an array of expected rows.
        Parameters:
        ps - the prepared statement to execute
        rows - array of expected rows to be returned for the different executions
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
